verbose_text: The fact that quantitative real-time PCR (qRT-PCR)-based analyses of LC3 mRNA expression failed to detect significant upregulation XREF_BIBR definitely suggested that trastuzumab-refractory JIMT-1 cells, but not trastuzumab sensitive SKBR3 cells, naturally exhibit constitutive enhancement of the net incorporation of LC3-II into autophagosomal membranes.
